Job Title: Finance Manager

Location: Greater Cleveland

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Finance, Management, Sales

Description:
Akkodis is seeking a Finance and Operations Manager for a full-time position with a client located in Cleveland, OH. This is a Hybrid role in Cleveland, OH, Columbus, OH or Pittsburgh, PA. Successful candidates will have 5+ years of proven experience in managing finance and operations for a Professional Services organization. 
Pay/Salary Range: $100,000-125,000/yr 
Senior Finance and Operations Manager job responsibilities include: Responsible for financial reporting and analysis for professional services business unit reviewing revenue and utilization forecasting, monthly P&L, quarterly reviews, project level accounting and budgeting Lead the team in customization and integration system enhancements. Provide financial analysis and recommendations to drive continuous improvement Assist with Pricing models and other financial projects as needed.  Qualifications: Bachelors degree in Finance or Business is desired Minimum 5 years of financial reporting and analysis is required Proven experience in GAAP and ASOC606 principles and standards is required Experience with Open Air and NetSuite ERP are required. SalesForce and ServiceNow experience desired. Experience in professional services industry is required.  If you are interested in this Finance and Operations Manager job in Cleveland, OH then please click APPLY NOW. For other opportunities available at Akkodis go to www.akkodis.com. If you have questions about the position, please contact Krysti Ellis at Krysti.Ellis@akkodisgroup.com.  Equal Opportunity Employer/Veterans/Disabled  Benefit offerings available for our associates include medical, dental, vision, life insurance, short-term disability, additional voluntary benefits, EAP program, commuter benefits and a 401K plan. Our benefit offerings provide employees with the flexibility to choose the type of coverage that meets their individual needs. In addition, our associates may be eligible for paid leave including Paid Sick Leave or any other paid leave required by Federal, State, or local law, as well as Holiday pay where applicable. To read our Candidate Privacy Information Statement, which explains how we will use your information, please visit https://www.modis.com/en-us/candidate-privacy/  The Company will consider qualified applicants with arrest and conviction records.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
